Package game.dinosaurs

Class DinoActor

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
game.dinosaurs.CapableActor
game.dinosaurs.DinoActor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, ActorInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
Allosaur, Brachiosaur, Pterodactyl, Stegosaur
public abstract class DinoActor
extends CapableActor
Base class for Stegosaur, Brachiosaur and Allosaur for representing dinosaur Actors.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private int age
    Age of the dinosaur, will only be incremented until the maturity age (since we only need to know when the dinoActor is mature).
    private java.util.ArrayList<Behaviour> behaviour
    An ArrayList of standard behaviours that the DinoActor should have.
    private int biteSize
    The size of DinoActor's jaw, will determine the amount of hit points gained if the food size is too big to be eaten whole.
    private DinoEncyclopedia dinoType
    A reference to DinoEncyclopedia Enum class that indicates the species of the DinoActor and contains many useful constants for initialization or comparison etc.
    private java.util.ArrayList<Behaviour> interactiveBehaviours
    ArrayList of Behaviours that requires two Actors to be in adjacent squares.
    private int pregnancyPeriod
    Indicates the number of turns till a pregnant female DinoActor has to wait till it is time to lay an Egg.
    private int unconsciousPeriod
    Indicates the number of turns till an unconscious DinoActor has till it dies.
    private int waterLevel
    Water level.

    Fields inherited from class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor

    displayChar, hitPoints, inventory, maxHitPoints, name

    Constructor.
    DinoActor​(DinoEncyclopedia dinoType, java.lang.Boolean isMatured, int nextId)
    Constructor that randomly assigns the DinoActor as male or female.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void adjustBreedingCapability()
    Determines whether the dinoActor should have the Capability to breed and add or remove the capability accordingly.
    private void adjustConsciousness()
    Adjust the consciousness of the DinoActor appropriately, according to its current hitPoints and/or waterLevel.
    private void aging()
    Increments the age of the dinosaur and simulates the action of the dinosaur growing up
    private boolean checkUnconsciousPeriod​(GameMap map)
    Checks whether the DinoActor is unconscious.

    Decrements the dinoActor's food level, which is equivalent to its hitPoints.

    (package private) void decrementWaterLevel()  
    void doWhenRaining()
    DinoActor will drink rain water and increment water level when it rains.

    Returns a collection of the Actions that the otherActor can do to the current Actor by going through the interactiveBehaviours array list and calling getAction.

    Select and return an action to perform on the current turn.

    Simulates DinoActor drinking water by increasing its water level according to the gulp size.

    Checks if the food level / hit points has reached the point where the dinoActor will get hungry.

    Checks if the water level has reached the point where the dinoActor will get thirsty.

    Updates the DinoActor's age and display character depending on the argument passed in, and adjusts the breeding capability based on whether it is matured or not.

  • Field Details

    • behaviour

      private java.util.ArrayList<Behaviour> behaviour
      An ArrayList of standard behaviours that the DinoActor should have.

    • interactiveBehaviours

      private java.util.ArrayList<Behaviour> interactiveBehaviours
      ArrayList of Behaviours that requires two Actors to be in adjacent squares.

    • dinoType

      private final DinoEncyclopedia dinoType
      A reference to DinoEncyclopedia Enum class that indicates the species of the DinoActor and contains many useful constants for initialization or comparison etc.

    • age

      private int age
      Age of the dinosaur, will only be incremented until the maturity age (since we only need to know when the dinoActor is mature).

    • pregnancyPeriod

      private int pregnancyPeriod
      Indicates the number of turns till a pregnant female DinoActor has to wait till it is time to lay an Egg.

    • unconsciousPeriod

      private int unconsciousPeriod
      Indicates the number of turns till an unconscious DinoActor has till it dies.

    • waterLevel

      private int waterLevel
      Water level.

    • biteSize

      private int biteSize
      The size of DinoActor's jaw, will determine the amount of hit points gained if the food size is too big to be eaten whole.

  • Constructor Details

    • DinoActor

      public DinoActor​(DinoEncyclopedia dinoType, DinoCapabilities sex, java.lang.Boolean isMatured, int nextId)
      Constructor.
      Parameters:
      dinoType - DinoEncyclopedia value that indicates species of the DinoActor
      sex - either DinoEncyclopedia.MALE or DinoEncyclopedia.FEMALE should be passed in to indicate the sex of the DinoActor
      isMatured - true if the DinoActor is grown up, false otherwise

    • DinoActor

      public DinoActor​(DinoEncyclopedia dinoType, java.lang.Boolean isMatured, int nextId)
      Constructor that randomly assigns the DinoActor as male or female.
      Parameters:
      dinoType - DinoEncyclopedia value that indicates species of the DinoActor
      isMatured - true if the DinoActor is grown up, false otherwise

    • initialization

      private void initialization​(boolean isMatured)
      Initialize maturity, max hit points, behaviours and capabilities of a DinoActor
      Parameters:
      isMatured - true if DinoActor should be a grown up DinoActor, false otherwise

    • setMaturity

      private void setMaturity​(boolean maturityStatus)
      Updates the DinoActor's age and display character depending on the argument passed in, and adjusts the breeding capability based on whether it is matured or not.
      Parameters:
      maturityStatus - true if intend to set DinoActor as matured, false otherwise.

      public void doWhenRaining()

    • isHungry

      public boolean isHungry()

    • isThirsty

      public boolean isThirsty()

    • roarIfHungry

      public void roarIfHungry​(GameMap map)
      Checks if the food level / hit points has reached the point where the dinoActor will get hungry. If yes, a hunger message will be printed out to notify the player.
      Parameters:
      map - GameMap that the actor is currently on

    • roarIfThirsty

      public void roarIfThirsty​(GameMap map)
      Checks if the water level has reached the point where the dinoActor will get thirsty. If yes, a hunger message will be printed out to notify the player.
      Parameters:
      map - GameMap that the actor is currently on

    • adjustBreedingCapability

      public void adjustBreedingCapability()
      Determines whether the dinoActor should have the Capability to breed and add or remove the capability accordingly.

    • initializePregnancyPeriod

      private void initializePregnancyPeriod()
      Initializes the dinoActor's pregnancy period to an appropriate value.

    • getPregnancyPeriod

      public int getPregnancyPeriod()

    • decrementPregnancyPeriod

      public void decrementPregnancyPeriod()

    • setPregnant

      public void setPregnant​(boolean status)
      Change the dinoActor's state appropriately depending on argument passed in. If true is given as an argument, the dinoActor is set to pregnant, otherwise dinoActor is set to not pregnant.
      Parameters:
      status - true if the dinoActor should be pregnant, false otherwise

    • setUnconscious

      public void setUnconscious​(boolean status)
      Sets the DinoActor to unconscious if the argument passed in is true, otherwise the DinoActor is set to be conscious.
      Parameters:
      status - true if the DinoActor should be unconscious, false otherwise

    • adjustConsciousness

      private void adjustConsciousness()
      Adjust the consciousness of the DinoActor appropriately, according to its current hitPoints and/or waterLevel.

    • initializeUnconsciousPeriod

      private void initializeUnconsciousPeriod()

    • decrementUnconsciousPeriod

      private void decrementUnconsciousPeriod()

    • checkUnconsciousPeriod

      private boolean checkUnconsciousPeriod​(GameMap map)
      Checks whether the DinoActor is unconscious. If it is, checks whether it is time for it to die yet. If it should be dead, a Corpse will replace the unconscious DinoActor, otherwise the unconsciousPeriod is decremented. Finally, returns true if the DinoActor is unconscious and false otherwise.
      Parameters:
      map - GameMap that the DinoActor is currently on
      Returns:
      false if the DinoActor is conscious, true otherwise

    • getAllowableActions

      public Actions getAllowableActions​(Actor otherActor, java.lang.String direction, GameMap map)
      Returns a collection of the Actions that the otherActor can do to the current Actor by going through the interactiveBehaviours array list and calling getAction.
      Overrides:
      getAllowableActions in class Actor
      Parameters:
      otherActor - the Actor that might be performing attack
      direction - String representing the direction of the other Actor
      map - current GameMap
      Returns:
      A collection of Actions.

    • playTurn

      public Action playTurn​(Actions actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
      Select and return an action to perform on the current turn.
      Specified by:
      playTurn in class Actor
      Parameters:
      actions - collection of possible Actions for this Actor
      lastAction - The Action this Actor took last turn. Can do interesting things in conjunction with Action.getNextAction()
      map - the map containing the Actor
      display - the I/O object to which messages may be written
      Returns:
      the Action to be performed
